title: Exxon Says Oil Slump Cut $1 Billion From Fourth-Quarter Results
description: Exxon Mobil Corp. said lower oil prices reduced fourth-quarter results by $800 million to $1.2 billion, one of the first signs that Big Oil is facing a tough earnings season.
content: Exxon Mobil Corp. said lower oil prices reduced fourth-quarter results by $800 million to $1.2 billion, one of the first signs that Big Oil is facing a tough earnings season.
